Text: Havent watch this video yet.However I am a man of code. You claim the video cannot contain viruses. THAT IS FALSE! Your video is in wmv format. Yes the compression is great however you can attach viruses onto wmv,asx and mov files. Or even a link in the video which will send you to a page with spyware, backdoors or worms. To stay away from these false rumors completely try using DIVX or X-Viid while maiking you videos. Also you can e-mail the admins here at TPB and ask them to remove malicious comments or delete his/thier accounts. Heck since your file would be .avi the TBP admins would know that they are postin false comment. Anyways I would'nt imagine someone taking all this time that YOU do to give us great movies and informative videos to place a virus in them and give "ReVIsed" a name you could'nt trust. Well screw those others I am downloading it right now then repost if I find a virus. Then everyone could know the truth. But until then Adios Amigos
